unnormalised: Urban planning in India faces unique challenges like managing population density in cities like Mumbai. Proper land use regulations, inspired by models like Chandigarh, are crucial. We need integrated transport like Delhi Metro, not just flyovers. Swades (the film) highlights rural-urban migration issues. The National Institute of Urban Affairs (NIUA) plays a vital role. Investment of Rs. 500 Cr. in sustainable infra is a start. Building more affordable housing within 5km of work centers is essential.
